==================
Experiment Results
==================

.. contents:: Table of Contents

COMETv3 Dataset
----------------

.. tabularcolumns:: |c|c|c|c|c|c|

+---------------------------+----------------------+-------------------------+------------------------+----------------------+
|  **Models**               | **Main-score (f1)**  | **Training time**       | **Inference time**     | **Size of model**    |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
|                           | **IC**    | **NER**  | **IC**     | **NER**    | **IC**     | **NER**   | **IC**    | **NER**  |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
| | ``FlairSequenceTagger`` | 0.92619   |  0.8820  | 0:00:34.75 | 00:58:44.0 | 0:00:04.27 | 0:00:05.1 |  ~ 82M    |  ~ 280M  |
| |          +              |           |          |            |            |            |           |           |          |
| | ``ULMFITClassifier``    |           |          |            |            |            |           |           |          |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
| ``OneNet``                | 0.9803    | 0.9162   |       0:21:34.05        |       0:00:03.95       |       ~ 6.2M         |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+-------------------------+------------------------+----------------------+
| ``JointIDSF``             | 0.9794    | 0.9343   |       2:22:04.23        |            -           |       ~ 520M         |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+-------------------------+------------------------+----------------------+




ATIS Dataset
-------------

- About `ATIS Dataset`_

.. _`ATIS Dataset`: https://arxiv.org/abs/1902.10909

.. tabularcolumns:: |c|c|c|c|c|c|

+---------------------------+----------------------+-------------------------+------------------------+----------------------+
|  **Models**               | **Main-score (f1)**  | **Training time**       | **Inference time**     | **Size of model**    |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
|                           | **IC**    | **NER**  | **IC**     | **NER**    | **IC**     | **NER**   | **IC**    | **NER**  |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
| ``OneNet``                | 0.9619    |  0.9320  |       0:14:03.03        |            -           |        ~ 5.7M        |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+------------+------------+------------+-----------+-----------+----------+
| ``JointIDSF``             | 0.9762    | 0.9498   |            -            |            -           |        ~ 517M        |
+---------------------------+-----------+----------+-------------------------+------------------------+----------------------+

- ATIS is public dataset that JointIDSF used to experiemnts.
